name: Kiki Corp.
description: Developer of a social application designed to connect like-minded real people to enjoy nearby experiences. The company's application permits users to search for a companion and organize plans with them, enabling users to make new friends and cultivate beautiful relationships.
one_liner: Developer of a social application designed to connect like-minded real people to enjoy nearby experiences. The company's application permits users to search for a companion and organize plans with them, enabling users to make new friends and cultivate beautiful relationships.
